This document outlines the warranty and ownership terms for Bunn Ultra Machines or substantially similar machines provided to the user. The warranty stipulates that if any products do not conform to the warranty and the user reports the nonconformity within ten days of delivery, the nonconforming product will be replaced at no cost to the user. The company expressly disclaims any liability for consequential and incidental damages, with their liability limited to the purchase price paid.

Regarding machine ownership, Bunn maintains ownership of the machines provided and ownership never transfers to the user without a written sale agreement. Bunn reserves the right to remove the machines from the user's location at any time for any reason and the user agrees not to impede or restrict removal. The machines may not be altered or modified without prior written consent from Bunn.
